string.text: hi_flyer - main developer: SDK, script, story implementation, game design, scripts, engine, shaders, dialogs, lighting, location compilation, geometry edits, locations, configs, ui design and customization, sound, etc.

Cartoteka - addition of design documents, additional lit. content, models. Domestos - textures, voiceover. Vinc - new models, website, media support. ypaL62 - animations and models. proger_Dencheek - engine, scripts. Vector - level12 modeling and design, r1 capsule model. CuJIbBEP - corrections of vegetation models, geometry corrections. Vladislav Messer - new models and animations.

Thanks to: Vx_SK98, Kirill Bespamyatnov, saas, Zone Chronicles Portal, 1RIDDICK11, DemonShrams, Shoker, Nikita Lebedin, Maxim Sukhodolov, DoubleT, Andrey Zotov, VEX, onetwo, Vladislav Suldin, RSFSR Andrey Makarov, Stanislav Cherskov, Rishad Allaberdiev, Gallard Records, RuWar, Kyanan Veliyev, Ilya Gorz, Pavel Fazluktinov, 2clip, lvg_brest, Ray Twitty (aka Shadows), nummer, dsh, charsi, Sergey Krasheninnikov, macron, Xray Oxygen team, OGSR engine team, Red_Virus, Modera, RuWar. And also to everyone who expected and believed in the project.
Special thanks to: Hypothermist, CapitN_KANG, Luis, ANDrevenge, STALKER - SHOC, Juan Pablo, Alexander Shkaredny, Kotyachiy
All events presented in the mod are fictional, all coincidences are coincidental. The mod is a free interpretation of not released project - S.T.A.L.K.E.R. Oblivion Lost.
